kreport.name: faultreasonByLevel

condition.name: billfaultreason
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='工单故障原因' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: fualtlevel
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='故障级别' and d.dvalue not like 'level_k_%' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: sfsystem
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='故障系统' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' #[and d.dvalue in (${s@user_areas})] order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5}%
data.tfoot: 合计 $[round(${4})] 100%

kreport.ksql: select nvl(rend(st.billfaultreason),'空') 工单故障原因, nvl(rend(st.fualtlevel),'空') 故障级别, nvl(rend(st.sfsystem),'空') 故障系统, st.total 工单数, round(st.total*100/t.total,2) 所占比例 from ( select i.billfaultreason,i.fualtlevel,i.sfsystem,count(*) total from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and i.replytime is not null #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] and i.itbusinesstype='ITBUT_2' #[and i.fualtlevel=${fualtlevel}] #[and i.sfsystem=${sfsystem}] #[and i.billfaultreason=${billfaultreason}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and i.area in (${s@user_areas})] #[and ${isflowITZX}(select 1 from rec_node itn where itn.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and itn.nodecode='45c80d11c0a86b4e01ea1f505eae726f')--是否流经IT中心管控] #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] group by i.billfaultreason,i.fualtlevel,i.sfsystem order by i.billfaultreason ) st, ( select count(*) total from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and i.replytime is not null and i.itbusinesstype='ITBUT_2' #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.fualtlevel=${fualtlevel}] #[and i.sfsystem=${sfsystem}] #[and i.billfaultreason=${billfaultreason}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and i.area in (${s@user_areas})] #[and ${isflowITZX}(select 1 from rec_node itn where itn.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and itn.nodecode='45c80d11c0a86b4e01ea1f505eae726f')--是否流经IT中心管控] #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] ) t
